statements: SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%chicken%';
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_name = 'Pasta Carbonara';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 3
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 2
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients, instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 4
SELECT recipe_name, instructions, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 5
SELECT * FROM Recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, cook_time FROM Recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients, steps FROM Recipes WHERE cook_time < 30;
SELECT recipe_name, cook_time FROM Recipes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%chicken%';
SELECT * FROM CookingLogs WHERE date='2022-01-15';
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, cook_time FROM Recipes WHERE cook_time > 30 ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Recipes WHERE recipe_id = 3;
SELECT recipe_id, recipe_name, steps, ingredients FROM Recipes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%chicken%' AND steps IS NOT NULL;
SELECT log_id, date, start_time, end_time, notes, Recipes.recipe_name FROM CookingLogs INNER JOIN Recipes ON CookingLogs.recipe_id = Recipes.recipe_id WHERE date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT * FROM Recipes ORDER BY recipe_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT id, recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM cooking_times WHERE cook_time_minutes > 30 ORDER BY cook_time_minutes DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM recipe_reviews GROUP BY recipe_id;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_name DESC;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes WHERE ingredients LIKE '%salt%' AND id < 5;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients, instructions FROM recipes JOIN cooking_times ON recipes.id = cooking_times.recipe_id WHERE cook_time_minutes > 30;
SELECT recipe_name, rating, comment FROM recipes JOIN recipe_reviews ON recipes.id = recipe_reviews.recipe_id WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM Recipe WHERE recipe_name = 'Spaghetti Carbonara';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM Recipe WHERE recipe_id = 3;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM Recipe ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Ingredient WHERE quantity >= 5;
SELECT equipment_name, category FROM CookingEquipment WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'Blender%';
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM Recipe WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM Recipe WHERE recipe_name LIKE '%pasta%';
SELECT * FROM Ingredient WHERE quantity > 10 AND unit = 'oz';
SELECT equipment_name, category FROM CookingEquipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT method_name, description FROM CookingMethod WHERE method_name = 'Grilling';
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes ORDER BY recipe_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, recipe_id, start_time, end_time FROM cooking_sessions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(cooking_time) AS longest_cooking_time FROM recipes;
SELECT ingredient_name, type FROM ingredients WHERE type = 'Spice';
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, cooking_time FROM recipes WHERE cooking_time > 30;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients[1] FROM recipes WHERE array_length(ingredients, 1) > 3;
SELECT users.username, recipes.recipe_name FROM users JOIN cooking_sessions ON users.user_id = cooking_sessions.user_id JOIN recipes ON cooking_sessions.recipe_id = recipes.recipe_id;
SELECT recipes.recipe_name, recipes_reviews.rating, recipes_reviews.comment FROM recipes JOIN recipes_reviews ON recipes.recipe_id = recipes_reviews.recipe_id WHERE recipes_reviews.rating >= 4;
